upsale-404: This upsale could not be found
del-upsell-confirm: Do you want to delete this upsell? This can't be undone.
not-apply-discount: Don't apply discount on this product
apply-custom-discount: Apply custom discount code on this product
custom-discount-disclaimer: Please make sure it exists in your Discounts page.
mp: Go to your product page and update it there. It will automatically change in your upsell.
when-product-is-removed-from-cart: If main product (not upsell) is removed from the cart...
when-products-in-cart: If specific products are in cart...
hide-if-products-in-cart: Hide this upsell if any of the products below are in the cart
select-products-empty-state: Select a list of products that you would like to check the cart against
true-upsale-description: Checking this box means that the main product will be removed from the cart for this one, use with caution.
artificial-price-description: Changing your price artificially will not change the price of the item. This feature is mostly used as we can only discount one product due to some Shopify limits. Be aware that the price in the cart will not be the artificial price of the product. Also this setting will overrule what you may have set under the discount section of this app
artificial-price-note: Note: Enabling artificial price will also remove the price from the continue button.
